scenario.name: registation101
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port] From: <sip:101@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:101@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:101@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0
